review: We ordered this from the US and its well worth the £32 we paid for it.It's really nice to be able to pick a movie on Netflix on my ipad or android phone and just send it to the TV; it overcomes the clunky TV interface and makes it much more usable.You can also use the mobile device as a remote.Shame I can't mirror the Chrome browser from my ipad, although it seems to work from a google laptop, but that's a minor thing and is probably more of a problem caused by Apple than Google.
